description: Marine Headquarters and the site of the Summit War, where the battle to rescue Portgas D. Ace from execution takes place.

keyEvents.title: Ace Declares His Desire to Live
keyEvents.description: At the execution platform in Marineford, Ace declares he wants to live after witnessing everyone's sacrifices for him.
keyEvents.significance: This declaration at the heart of Marine power represents Ace's acceptance of his own worth despite his heritage.

keyEvents.title: Whitebeard vs Akainu Escalates
keyEvents.description: The battle between Whitebeard and Admiral Akainu intensifies as Whitebeard's age begins to show.
keyEvents.significance: The plaza of Marineford becomes the stage for the clash between generations and ideologies.

keyEvents.title: Admirals Systematically Attack Whitebeard Commanders
keyEvents.description: The Admirals coordinate attacks across Marineford to wound Marco and freeze Jozu, turning the tide of battle.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the strategic importance of Marineford's layout in the Admirals' coordinated defense.

statusHistory.reason: The Summit War continues with devastating battles across the plaza
